polygon.title: Polygon
polygon.text: A geometric shape that is made up of straight line segments.

regpoly.title: Regular Polygon
regpoly.text: A polygon in which all edges have the same length.

square.title: Square
square.text: A regular quadrilateral: all edges and all angles have the same size.

equilateral.title: Equilateral Triangle
equilateral.text: A regular triangle: all sides have the same size.

intangle.title: Internal Angle
intangle.text: The angles on the inside at every vertex of a polygon.

trapezium.title: Trapezium
trapezium.text: A quadrilateral in which a pair of opposite edges are parallel.

parallelogram.title: Parallelogram
parallelogram.text: A quadrilateral in which both pairs of opposite edges are parallel.

kite.title: Kite
kite.text: A quadrilateral in which two pairs of adjacent edges have the same length.

rectangle.title: Rectangle
rectangle.text: A quadrilateral in which all angles are 90°.

rhombus.title: Rhombus
rhombus.text: A quadrilateral in which all edges have the same length.

edge.title: Edge
edge.text: The “sides” of a polygon or “lines” of a polyhedron.

face.title: Face
face.text: The polygons which are “sides” of a polyhedron.

tessellation.title: Tessellation
tessellation.text: A geometric pattern that covers a surface without gaps or overlaps.

polyhedron.title: Polyhedron
polyhedron.text: A 3-dimensional solids in which all faces are polygons.

platonic.title: Platonic Solid
platonic.text: A polyhedron made up of only one kind of regular polygon, that looks the same from every direction.

archimedean.title: Archimedean Solid
archimedean.text: A polyhedron made up of different kinds of regular polygons, that looks the same from every direction.
